name: 4PS ruleset MS CodeCop BC26.2
description: These rules must be respected by all the AL code written within the company.

rules.justification: This rule contains a bug and does not work with '4ps' as API publisher name.

The application 'Application', originally by 'Microsoft', is now published by '4PS B.V.' due to the use of a custom base application. Once migrated to the Microsoft Base Application, updating the dependency reference is recommended to ensure compatibility and benefit from improvements or bug fixes.
